name: Black Rhinestone Bustier Top
description:
Inspired by Film Noir and the Edgar Allen Poe poem "The Raven"...
This bustier top is ready to take on the night!

Underwear becomes outerwear...
Each cup is encrusted with black rhinestones that are placed individually by hand. Topped off with a removable satin bow brooch.

This looks amazing with a pencil skirt (shown), a tutu, and high waisted jeans. Perfect for a cocktail party, night on the town, performance, prom, or bridal ensemble.

This item is made to order in your size!
32A-40D
Elastic waist, double hook and eye closure at the back.

This item is made to order.
Expect 2-3 weeks from start to finish.
Please convo me with your size.
If you need to put a rush on your order, please convo me.
**This listing is for the bustier only***

name: Black on Black Tulle Tutu Skirt
description:
Step into the fairy tale...

I made this beautiful tutu skirt from 15 yards of delicate black matte tulle! Black is so chic and works for so many occasions. Hand finished at the waist with 6 yards of black satin ribbon that ties in a bow at the back. Elastic waist for easy off and on. I am including a black flocked sheer polka dot under skirt (a separate piece) for underneath.

This is perfect for a prom, cocktail party,bridesmaid or performance.


You will receive a FREE GIFT with this item... Check it out:
www.etsy.com/listing/52380580/dark-pony-designs-logo-necklace

This item is made to order. Please convo me with your size choice in "note from the buyer" during check out.

-Small-
Waist: 22-26"
Hips: up to 36"
Length: 25-26"

-Medium-
Waist: 27-31"
Hips: up to 40"
Length: 25-26"

-Large-
Waist: 31-36"
Hips: up to 44"
Length: 25-26"

Please expect 2-4 weeks for completion.

name: Black Lace Cameo Gloves One Size Fits All
description:
Lovely lacey gloves embellished with a tiny cameo button and black satin bows...elegant and mysterious...

These gloves look amazing with a cocktail dress, or rock them with a black leather bustier!

Little Bo Peep meets Karl Lagerfeld....

Size:
one size fits all (ladies)
-MADE TO ORDER-
1-2 weeks

name: Lightning Strikes Twice Eco Felt Earrings
description:
These earrings are ready to light up the night!

Made from eco-felt (a polyester fabric that is made from 100% recycled plastic bottles) that is covered in sparkling glitter and sequins- they are lightweight and make a statement.

Each pair is cut and embellished by hand.

Perfect for that night out or with your favorite tee!

Great gift.

Drop:
4"
